item.title: About me
item.description:
You have found my personal internetial residence.

Currently I work with physical security, IoT and cloud at YourSix. You wanna work with us? Shoot me a message!

In my spare time I tinker and muck around with all kinds of tech related to software and computers. As I do something that might be of even the least interest for anyone else than myself, I might write a post about it here. As you can see though - this site isn’t really the center of gravity (just yet).

Everything on this site is as copy-left as it possibly can become.
